casebody.data:
THOMAS McDONALD v. ARCHIBALD McDONALD, ROBERT GREY and AMEY, his Wife, JAMES McDONALD and MOLLY, his Wife, ABIGAIL McKEE, ELIZABETH GIFFIN, AMY KASSIN, CATHARINE ROBINSON, JOHN HANNA and LYDIA, his Wife. Court of Chancery. New Castle. August 26, 1818. Ridgely’s Notebook II, 263.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
